item.title: ARC divident
item.description: Token - ARC Arch is a token that brings profit in the form of dividends to all its holders. For example, if you have 10,000 Arc tokens on your wallet balance, then you will automatically be included in the list of those who will receive weekly dividend payments. Example with a balance of 10,000 ARC tokens, holding tokens on a balance of 10,000 thousand, you will receive +630 ARC tokens on the day of payment.
